name: Meowtini
description:
📖 Premise

Set in a quaint bar,  Meowtini is a cozy game about a cat who must fulfill drink orders for his furry friends before time runs out. Make a variety of cocktails: whiskers on the rocks, meowjitos, and more!

🎮 Instructions

To create the purrfect drink, add the right type of alcohol, juice, and amount of ice to your shaker. Mouse only.

📝 Credits
  • Peter Sutarjo | Programmer
  • Richard Cheng | Programmer
  • Emily Pitcher | Artist
  • Tiffany Shen | Artist
  • Julia Lee | Artist
  • Ming Zhu | Programmer
  • Caroline Wang | UI / Artist

Made in 48 hours for the Berklee Game Jam on behalf of AbleGamers, a charity dedicated to creating communities and accessibility tools for gamers with disabilities. Donate here and be sure to include our game in your donation!
